title: Project
description: Response of a POST request and GET lookup requests.

cristin_unit_id.description: Cristin-unit-IDs consist of 4 numbers separated by '.'.

cristin_institution_and_unit.description: A Cristin unit and its corresponding parent institution.

cristin_institution_id.description: Cristin institution ID of the institution.

institution_name.description: Name of the institution. In Bokm책l for Norwegian institutions.

url.description: URL of the Web service that returns extended information about this institution.

unit_name.description: Name of the unit. In Bokm책l for Norwegian units.

url.description: URL of the Web service that returns extended information about this unit.

warnings.description: Warnings, e.g. about fields necessary for publishability.

exempt_from_public_disclosure.description: Whether the project is exempt from public disclosure. In GET projects this field is only shown if true. In the POST projects response it's shown if it was included in the request. Projects POSTed by REK are published in Cristin by default even if the value of this field is true, but can be de-published using the Cristin Webapp.

publishable.description: Whether the project satisfies the requirements to be published in Cristin.

published.description: Whether the project is published in Cristin.

title.description: Project titles indicating their language. Only one title is included by default: the title in the project's main language.

main_language.description: Language code for the project's main language.

other_languages.description: If there is data in any other language than the main language for any of the five fields mentioned in the first description above, then this array indicates the languages of such data. In Progress: We will later implement a way to retrieve the data in these other languages.

coordinating_institution.description: Coordinating institution. Referred by some institutions as 'koordinerende forskningsansvarlig enhet' or 'prosjekteier'.

institutions_responsible_for_research.description: Institutions responsible for research. Referred by institutions as 'forskningsansvarlig institusjon'.

start_date.description: The same start date as in the project plan. The status of the project is 'ACTIVE' within the registered start_date and end_date.

end_date.description: Anticipated end date. The same end date as in the project plan. The status of the project is 'ACTIVE' within the registered start_date and end_date.

status.description: Project status, based solely on start_date and end_date. NOTSTARTED: Not yet started (en), Ikke p책begynt (nb), Ikkje p책begynt (nn); ACTIVE: Active (en), Aktivt (nb), Aktivt (nn); CONCLUDED: Concluded (en), Avsluttet (nb), Avsluttet (nn).

created.description: Reference to the source that created the project in Cristin, and the date when it was created.

source_short_name.description: If the project was initially created by an institutional source, this field contains its short name, e.g., REK.

last_modified.description: Reference to the source that made the last change to the project data in Cristin, and the date of the change.

source_short_name.description: If the project was last modified by an institutional source, this field contains its short name.

project_funding_sources.description: Funding sources. In Progress: A Web service that provides more information about the funding source codes and names will be made available later.

funding_source_code.description: Cristin code for the funding source.

project_code.description: The project code used by the funding source.

total_funding_amount.description: The total funding amount for the project from all funding sources.

currency_code.description: Currently this is always NOK (Norwegian kroner).

contact_person_or_place.description: Name of the contact person or place for this project

web_page.description: External Web page. The project's Web page outside the Cristin system.

participants.description: A list of people associated with the project. For more information about each person use the URL.

url.description: URL for Web service providing extended information about the person.

role_code.description: The resource '/projects/participants/roles' provides names and translations of the role codes.

name.description: Name of the HRCS research activity.
Name of the HRCS health category.

results.description: URL links to GET results/{id}. Publications and other results produced through or otherwise related to the project.

health_project_type.description: Health project classification. DRUGSTUDY: Drug study (en), Legemiddelstudium (nb), Legemedelstudium (nn); OTHERCLIN: Other clinical trial (en), Annet klinisk behandlingsstudium (nb), Anna klinisk behandlingsstudium (nn); OTHERSTUDY: Other study (en), Annet studium (nb), Anna studium (nn).

health_project_type_name.description: Name of health project classification. DRUGSTUDY: Drug study (en), Legemiddelstudium (nb), Legemedelstudium (nn); OTHERCLIN: Other clinical trial (en), Annet klinisk behandlingsstudium (nb), Anna klinisk behandlingsstudium (nn); OTHERSTUDY: Other study (en), Annet studium (nb), Anna studium (nn).

external_sources.description: Information regarding external sources that have provided data about the project.

items.description: Information regarding a source of project data.

source_short_name.description: Short name of the source of the project data (e.g., REK, NFR, EU).

source_reference_id.description: Reference ID used by the source of the project (for example the internal project number at The Norwegian Research Council).
